description: Primes formed by concatenation of first k odd numbers.
comments: The next term (a(5)) has 93 digits. - _Harvey P. Dale_, Mar 05 2013a(6) has 9725 digits (see A066811(6) or A046036(6)). - _Michel Marcus_, Jan 31 2014
references: R. W. Stephan, Factors and Primes in Two Smarandache Sequences, Smarandache Notions Journal, second edition, Vol. 9, No. 1-2, 1998, 5-11.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Consecutive Number Sequences
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Charles T. Le (charlestle(AT)yahoo.com)
extensions: Edited by _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 23 2010
